blog.name: thatonephanrpaccount
blog.title: ThatOnePhanAcount
blog.description: Planned to make this for ever ago, forgot, and now I'm here. Just a Phan role play account.

summary: Punk! Phil x Pastel! Dan Rp.
body:
Punk! Phil x Pastel! Dan Rp.

Recently, Phil moved to Dan’s high school. Straight away, he mixed in, with what some people would call, the bad crowd. He was quite popular and did whatever he wanted, when he wanted. On his first day he noticed Dan, who wasn’t popular at all. He had a frail figure and dressed in light colours. He looked almost ill with the weight, or lack of, on his body.

One day, Dan was last to leave the changing rooms and Phil friends ganged up on him, bullying the shit out of him. When Phil walks in on them, what does he do?

summary: Stray Kids incorrect quotes by Dan Howell
body:
Stray Kids incorrect quotes by Dan Howell

Minho: fight me you ceramic bitch

Hyunjin: that’s the sound of me “nope"ing

Han: I’m the living embodiment of ‘it could be worse’

Seungmin: sand… fuck off

Jeongin: I’m about as intimidating as a butterfly

Woojin: holy mother of rectangles

Chan: I’m just a humble trash can trying to roll my way through life

Changbin: let’s get the hecky heck out of here

Felix: come for the accent, stay for the existential crisis

Chan: I’m holding you back from achieving things in your life by forcing you to sit here and watch this

Minho: oh jesus fuck

Han: stalk him until he loves you

Seungmin: wet n wild, just like me

Felix: gender rolls are the kind of bread

Woojin: anime has a lot more abs

Changbin: naked Justin Timberlake would objectively be the best birthday present ever

blog.name: phanfictioncatalogue
blog.title: phanfiction catalogue
blog.description:
mobile users, click here!

please refer to our FAQ first.

Our goal is to create an alphabetized library of every phanfiction in the phandom. Besides that, we compile masterlists of different genres that are scheduled for posting every few days, and help find fics that have been mislocated.

title: Birthday Fics (7) Masterlist
body:
part one, part two, part three, part four, part five, part six

11 June, 2018 - daniactuallysnuffledthatpopcorn

Summary: Despite the fact that they have two shows in Warsaw on Dan’s birthday, Phil intends to make it the perfect day.

A Decade of Loving You (ao3) - wekingsandprettythings

Summary: Phil remembers the first time he wished Dan happy Birthday, 9 years ago. he remembers wanting to kiss him but being 300 miles away and barely even his friend, only to now be in bed with him in a hotel in Poland and wanting to make sweet love to him.

a different kind of birthday present - phantasticlizzy

Summary: “Just sit back and relax, birthday boy, I got you,”

A Quiet Kind of Celebration (ao3) - alimacbrux

Summary: It’s Phil’s birthday, so the boys head over to the Isle of Man for a break…ironically from all the birthday celebrations.

Birthday Boys - elisethephangirl

Summary: Birthday fic with fluff and dogs.

Birthday In Vegas (ao3) - thatsthephan

Summary: In honor of my squishy son’s birthday, I have written a Vegas fic.

Birthday Misfortunes - yiffandquiff

Summary: It’s Phil’s 32nd birthday and he accidentally takes Viagra.

Birthdays In Poland (ao3) - librapinof

Summary: The fic where it’s Dan’s 27th birthday while they’re on tour and Phil makes sure to still go above and beyond for the love of his life.

Birthday Spanks - jilliancares

Summary: It’s Dan’s birthday and all he wants is a spanking.

Birthday Surprise (ao3) - MaeTaurus

Summary: Phil buys Dan a new toy for his birthday and throws him an extra special birthday party.

Birthday Traditions - toomanytickles

Summary: Every year, Dan and Phil have a birthday tradition that leaves Dan in a giggly mess.

Chocolate Coated - philsdrill

Summary: Dan finally admits one of his kinks to Phil, that he wants to give a blowjob to a chocolate covered dick. At first Phil kinkshames him, but by the time Dan’s birthday comes around, Phil has realised he actually likes the idea.

Forever, please (ao3) - LiterallyAmazingPhan

Summary: A Dan birthday fic based on the prompt: Phil wants to prepare a gift for Dan and can’t think of anything so he contacts all of their friends to create a massive masterpiece gift for him:)

Gimme That Look That Takes Me Home (ao3) - theprincessed

Summary: Phil comes home from visiting his parents ready to spend his actual birthday with Dan, but Dan has some minor issues to work through first.

I’ll See You In The Future (When We’re Older) - uselessphillie

Summary: ‘Let’s just stay here, I just want you.’ Because the birthday boy should always get what he wants.

June’s good, but October… (ao3) - winstonlives

Summary: Phil really lets it all out for Dan’s birthday present, literally and figuratively.

One Last Present (ao3) - writingwannabe

Summary: Phil is spending his 32nd birthday on the Isle of Man with his family. Dan has planned the day perfectly, and has a very important question to ask - ‘will you marry me?’

Rimming And Wrinkles - howellaboutyas

Summary: Dan offers Phil anything he wants for his birthday. Phil decides he wants to try something slightly… different in the bedroom. (Literally just birthday smut.) 

Since We Came Here Together (ao3) - kay_okay

Summary: “Happy birthday, Dan.”

Dan feels the words come out of Phil’s mouth, and he reaches to pull it against his own again, and again, and again. He loses track of time and vaguely, in some far-away, rational corner of his muddled mind thinks they’ve both been away from the group too long.

“Get me out of here,” he breaks apart and begs, warm and insistent into Phil’s open mouth.

Thirty (ao3) - waveydnp

Summary: Phil is feeling anxious about his upcoming birthday. Luckily Dan is there to make him feel better.

reblog.comment:
part one, part two, part three, part four, part five, part six

Rimming And Wrinkles - howellaboutyas

Summary: Dan offers Phil anything he wants for his birthday. Phil decides he wants to try something slightly… different in the bedroom. (Literally just birthday smut.) 

Since We Came Here Together (ao3) - kay_okay

Summary: “Happy birthday, Dan.”

Dan feels the words come out of Phil’s mouth, and he reaches to pull it against his own again, and again, and again. He loses track of time and vaguely, in some far-away, rational corner of his muddled mind thinks they’ve both been away from the group too long.

“Get me out of here,” he breaks apart and begs, warm and insistent into Phil’s open mouth.

Thirty (ao3) - waveydnp

Summary: Phil is feeling anxious about his upcoming birthday. Luckily Dan is there to make him feel better.

summary: June 12: After All These Years (Chapter Two)
title: June 12: After All These Years (Chapter Two)
body:
Mature

Tags: Dog fic, Canon divergence, friends to lovers, slow burn, domestic fluff,

Summary:  They met her after tour. Martyn’s friend’s dog had puppies and Phil fell in love at first sight. Dan did too, but he’ll deny it if you ask.

Dan tries to keep his distance, because she’s Phil’s dog not his, but she isn’t having any of it.

Start from the beginning ¦ Read on ao3

I’m posting a fic (or chapter of a fic) every day in June 2019 here is a list of them. Here are the ones I did in June 2018 and here are the ones I did in June 2017

summary: B: finds A sobbing on the floor “Are... are you oka-” A: “I GOT G-NOTED BY MY OWN FUCKING PLAYLIST.” B: “Uh...” A: “I’VE BEEN...
body:
B: finds A sobbing on the floor “Are… are you oka-”

A: “I GOT G-NOTED BY MY OWN FUCKING PLAYLIST.”

B: “Uh…”

A: “I’VE BEEN BETRAYED.”

blog.name: phanfeed-ao3
blog.title: Phanfiction!
blog.description:
!!! READ THE FAQ BEFORE SENDING ME AN ASK !!!

Mobile Links

This blog is autoposts anything that gets put in the Dan Howell/Phil Lester tag on Archive of Our Own (AO3).

Sometimes the applet on IFTT I use straight up breaks. I don't recommend turning on notifications for this blog. Links don't work on mobile.

Admin: Ozzy (foolishdeadbeat)

title: Every Saturday Morning
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2X59rny

by croissantbleu

Dan’s life was uneventful, working at a law firm, trying (and failing) to stay on top of his work despite his ADHD getting in the way, and playing the piano on Saturdays.
But things changed when he found a phone number in a book, and finds someone who makes him want to follow his dreams.

Words: 1467, Chapters: 1/5, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Phandom/The Fantastic Foursome (YouTube RPF)
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Dan Howell, Phil Lester, Original Male Character(s)
  • Relationships: Dan Howell/Phil Lester
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe, Lawyer Dan Howell, kind of, Piano, Dan Howell has ADHD, and all that goes with it, Texting, Tags Contain Spoilers, Strangers to Lovers, Getting Together, Fluff, Writer Phil Lester, Editor Phil Lester, Follow your dreams kids, mention of parents issues, based on my own experience with adhd


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2X59rny

if using please like/rb!

no need to credit but please redirect if anyone asks!

these all look best with a white tumblr background!
